title: r/Pettyrevenge I Made My Bully Cry!
description:
r/Pettyrevenge In today's episode, OP was walking home from school one day when a group of bullies blaze past on their bicycles and shout rude things at OP. Well, OP decides that she's not going to take this sitting down, so she looks up the lead bully's address on the Internet and calls his mom! She tells her that her son is a complete bully to other students for no good reason. The mom is absolutely INFURIATED with her son's behavior, and the bully quickly gets a dose of his own medicine. If you like this podcast and you want to see more, hit the follow button for more daily Reddit podcasts!
